inclusion.criterion: Receiving > or equal 30mg of Prednisone per day
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: No new MG-specific treatments in prior 3 months
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Willingness to participate in study protocol
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: She is a research coordinator and has 3 children.

inclusion.criterion: Treatment with any immunomodulator > than or equal to 3 months prior to trial initiation.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: She takes pyridostigmine 60 mg three times a day.

exclusion.criterion: Previous thromboembolic events, including deep vein thrombosis, stroke and myocardial infarction
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: MGFA Class I, IV (if patient requires hospitalization) or V
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Thymectomy in previous year or planning to undergo thymectomy in next six months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy or lactation; unwillingness to avoid pregnancy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Serious concurrent medical, neurological or psychiatric condition that would interfere with IGSC administration or subsequent clinical assessments
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unwillingness or incapacity to participate, agree to necessary follow-up visits, or give written and informed consent
exclusion.label: met

notes: The patient has myasthenia gravis with some symptoms that interfere with her job. She takes pyridostigmine but still experiences some issues.
